Jane's friends as they went home to get their things as not was this going to be a play date and study session but, also a sleepover. Your mom helped you and your friends set up blankets and cushions for the sleep over, You all talked about your favorite characters in Frozen until you all eventually went to sleep. That is of course except for Jane, who despite herself managed to keep herself awake. She got up and quietly inched her way over to where you were sleeping.

"Okay wig, are you listening?" she whispered. The wig forced your asleep body to sit up to confirm. "Alright good. First, I wanted to say good job. Making Liam more like Amy was brilliant idea." The wig was flattered by his mother's compliment. "Now, we are on the final stretch, since I'm back in my life, we need to start solidifying Liam... or should I say Lisa's new life. So you probably already started but, I want you give her more control but only when she is cooperating within our plans, if you feel she gets out of line try subtly push her back. Also, try to make her more distinct from me, of course, I'm definitely not asking you to make her boyish, eww. Just a couple things to help her realize her own life and not just copying mine." The wig gave a slow nod with your body. "Thanks! Love you and sweet dreams." Jane whispered as she gave a yawn and headed sleep herself.

13121122112211121112221112111111.content:
Once school was out, Ashley made her way back to the house to confront Jane. Along the way, she spotted a clothing store with some cute, girlish clothes on display. Although she tried to resist, an urge began to bubble up in her mind and she eventually caved and went in. She bought three outfits: two pink and one baby blue with some light greens and a new pair of high heels. With her bags in tow and the urge sated, Ashley made her way back home.

Jane and Lisa were chatting while they were watching their favorite show when Ashley got home. "Jane, come here. We need to talk." She said sternly as she gestured to the hallway. Jane followed, assuring the timid Lisa that everything was fine so she could go back to her viewing.

"Ok, Ashley. What's up?"

"What's up? How about the fact that you used magic on me! Why?" Ashley asked clearly distressed.

"Ah, well, ya see, Lisa is almost ready and I wanted to take care of the last loose end, You." Jane explained calmly.

"Loose end? I gave you the magic in the first place and helped you use it, why am I a loose end?"

"Because you are the only one who remembered Liam and had the power to reverse. I needed to make sure that Mom and Lisa were here to stay."

"So you're turning me into just like them too?"

"No, unlike Mom and Liam, I don't know how to do the complicated stuff like you do. So I used the remainder of what you gave me with the magic hair and cast a simple thought amplification spell."

"So these cutesy and girlish thoughts are because they have been amplified from my own subconscious?"

"Yep, you were always smarter than Liam!"

"But, I can't remember my spells."

"That's part of the hair, you'll get your spells back after the... 'training' is over with."

"Listen, I know you don't know how to reverse this so I'll try to figure something out, but when I do, I'll pay you back for this." Ashley said as she walked back to her room.

You let out a big yawn as moved around on top of Jane's bed, it was so soft and comfy. You began to struggle to keep your eyes open and look for anything out of the ordinary but, with another big yawn, just taking a quick nap sounded more and more appealing in your head. You briefly considered going back to your room but, that thought quickly escaped you as your body felt heavy from this sudden exhaustion washing over you and as you slowly sunk onto Jane's bed and closed your eyes, the reasons you came into the room had completely left your mind.

Next...
1341.title: You suddenly feel very sleepy

13411.content:
The next thing you know you are sleepily waking up in your own bed. 'Didn't I fall asleep in Jane's room? Or was that just a dream?' you thought to yourself. As you begin to get out of bed, you feel very refreshed, that was probably the best sleep in long time, You took a look at the clock and it was 11 in the morning, 'looks like I slept in a little, but who cares, its Saturday and I feel great!' After getting dressed in the same clothes as your 'dream', you headed downstairs to prepare yourself some brunch.

As you eat your sandwich, notice a note on the fridge that looked exactly like the one from your 'dream' as well as the chores your mom had laid out for you. 'I better get on to those chores and I can even turn the TV in the background', as you took out the dust cloth to wide down the living room you turned on the TV, but it was on one Jane's girly shows, she must have been watching it this morning, you look for the remote but you can't seem to find it. 'Did Jane hide it or is just lost for now? Eh, whatever. I'll just leave it on anyway. I just want something to drown out the silence anyway.' You were in too good a mood to care about the cleaning or the girly shows.

As you continued to dust off the living room, you notice that the girly show you had been listening to must be having a marathon today as you had practically memorized the intro theme and could remember some of the traits of the main characters as you listen. By the time you had finished dusting and vacuuming, you found yourself humming parts of the song to yourself.

It was just past two and all that was left was washing the dishes. As you washed the dishes, you wiggled your butt to the beat of the shows girly pop tunes it played through out the show, 'maybe the show isn't that bad, maybe I'll here Jane out next time'. Despite doing chores all day, it was pretty good, 'guess taking care to going to bed a little earlier can make all the difference.'

It was now around three-thirty as you finished the dishes and you could here your mom pulling the car into the garage.

Your mom and Ashley walked in together with a variety of shopping bags and smiles on their faces as they chatted about her swimming team with Jane following behind both equally happy and having almost as many bags as her elders.

You nonchalantly greeted them as you as you headed back up to your room. Your Mom thanked you for doing the chores around the house reached the stairs. Before you left, you remembered to ask Jane about the TV remote. She seemed confident about its location until she started looking for it,'guess she did just lose it'. You family then came together and searched for the remote for the next thirty minutes only to find it behind some of the DVDs it had slid behind when Jane had put it down for the girls day out.

In your room, you watched some videos on Youtube for a bit of some sketch comedy and let's plays, you saw a small clip of the girly show you had been listening to today and decided to check it out, you found it very entertaining despite its target demographic and liked the video.

It was getting close to 9 so you decided to go to bed early hoping your theory pays off.

1341121.content:
You woke up at six in the morning and while you did feel more refreshed than usual it didn't really compare to the euphoria of the rest you had the yesterday. You got dressed and went downstairs and saw Mom's credit card with a note, "use for anything you might need". You had forgotten that Ashley was going on retreat with her swim team and Mom was going away for business for the next week, so it would just be you and Jane. The retreat was sponsored by the school, this week was meant for the juniors and seniors to take their SAT's and the teams to get close on their annual retreats, so the you had the next week off lucky.

You poured yourself some cereal and Jane sleepily came down from her room at about seven. You reminded her of the Mom and Ashley situation which she in turn reminded you that she would be hanging out at her friend's house til noon. After she had breakfast, she swiftly got ready and left for her friend's house without missing a beat.

You were still disappointed that you didn't get the same result as last time just because you went to bed early. Maybe there was something more that you were missing which led back to your memories of the 'dream'. Curious and slightly desperate to find a clue to your problem, you entered Jane's room. The bright pink walls and the stereotypical girly girl vibe was evermore present as you entered. When you went to touch Jane's bed again, the same sleepiness you felt before struck, this time you did not struggle against your sleepiness and quickly fell asleep once again.

You woke up to the same refreshing feeling you did yesterday, this time you were still in Jane's room. "Am I still dreaming? Or wait, maybe the 'dream' yesterday wasn't a dream at all! But then how did I get back to my room the first time? Maybe, I felt so sleepy that I just wandered back to my room and just didn't remember. That sounds the most plausible." But then what was the reason you keep feeling so refreshed after falling asleep in Jane's room? "Maybe it's the atmosphere, I guess. The environment here is just so nice to me that I end up feeling better just from sleeping in it!" You were beginning to feel a lot better and... perkier? I guess that was a good way to describe it. You checked the clock and it was almost noon, Jane would be back. Maybe talking to her about can help you find a more permanent solution?
1341121.title: You wake up not as refreshed as you hoped

choices: You and Jane play a video game in your room
You play dress up with Jane as thanks
13411211.content:
Right on cue, Jane walked through the door at exactly noon. You briskly walk down to find Jane putting her bag down on the couch. Although you were embarrassed to confess to sleeping your little sister's room, you felt like you had to if you wanted to make any progress on your dilemma.

"Hey Jane, can I talk to you about something."

"Sure, what's up?"

Your face became a little red, "Well... to be honest I have fallen asleep in your room. Twice."

Jane let out a noise of both surprise and amusement, "What! Why?" She clearly found it amusing that her 16 year old brother had slept in his little sister's room.

"Let me give you the full story", you wanted to quickly explain yourself before she got into a giggle fit, "Yesterday while you guys were out, I thought I heard something something from your room. So, I checked but when I got into your room I felt really tired so I fell asleep and somehow sleepwalked back to my room." Jane gave you a confused look, but you continued, "When I woke up a couple hours later, I found myself in a really good mood, like super SUPER good mood and thought it was a dream and I thought it was because I got more sleep, So I went to bed early last night hoping I would get the same result." Jane seemed to be getting the idea, at least little. "However, while I did wake up today feeling better than usual, it wasn't what it was like when fell asleep in your room, so I checked your room, fell asleep again and now I have the same refreshed feeling like before."

"Soooo..., why are you telling me all this?" Jane seemed curious rather than angry, probably because she found so interesting.

"So, I came to the conclusion that your room is what's making me feel so refreshed and I need your help."

"So, your saying you want to sleep in my room?"

"No, I want your help to redecorate my room to look like your's." You said with an earnest look on your face.

Jane's face lit up, "Really? That sounds fun! If you are sure, let's go!" She quickly grabbed her bag and skipped back toward the door.

"Yeah, I'm sure, it will work!" You moved to the kitchen counter and grabbed the card mom had left you, she did say for anything you might need, and followed after Ashley to the car for the store.

You let Jane take the lead as she was the expert, she grabbed paint cans of pink, white and lavender and a fluffy pink rug. She also helped you pick out some easy to assemble furniture that had garish and feminine designs carved into the sides as well as a new girlish bed spread, blanket and pillow cover, all covered in prints of flowers. After you had paid for those, Jane borrowed the card, saying she one small thing in mind and took off. By the time you had loaded everything into the car, Jane had returned with a girlish frame cover for your TV, computer and even your game console, all echoing what seemed to be a flower theme.

Thanks to Jane's assistance, the whole trip took about 2 and half hours. "Hey Jane. Let's have a quick snack then start on the room." Jane eagerly agreed, the two of you made sandwiches and took the next half hour eating and chatting.

You first cleared out your room and laid out the tarp so you could paint the walls, along with paint you bought Jane brought a yellow paint that still had a little bit of paint left. The two of you first painted the walls completely pink and after began to paint flowers with colors ranging from white to lavender to yellow to a paint mix that had either pink and white or pink and lavender. After the paint was safe enough to touch, you assembled the furniture you bought: a pastel white desk with a carving all along the rim and a horizontal shelf with a cupboard with similar girlish carving. Jane ran back into her room and came with a heart shaped lock with heart shaped key for the cupboard and then proceeded to paint some flowers on cupboard's door. Lastly came the tedious task of putting everything back in your room. You put your games in the cupboard and put the newly flower cased TV, Laptop and Game console back were they belonged laid out the pink rug and covered your bed in the new flower bed sheets.

The both of you were tired but satisfied with the job done. When you looked at the clock it was just past 6, so you made dinner for you and Jane and spent more time talking, Jane was so happy to have helped you out and really enjoyed your new room, even suggesting they play a game together sometime, which she never seemed to want to do before. You had fun talking to her about random stuff while eating your dinner and doing the dishes together. When 8:30 came along, Jane let out a big yawn and excused herself to get ready for bed and you decided to do the same.

Coming to your new room and taking your pajamas out of your closet was little jarring at first, but when you tucked yourself into your flower print bed, you quickly fell asleep.

The next day, you woke up feeling as refreshed as the first time you slept in Jane's room. It worked!

Next...
13411211.title: Redecorating your room

134112111.content:
You in an almost zen-like sate as you walked down to the kitchen for breakfast and as you began to cook some pancakes, Jane walked in.

"Hey bro", she said with a yawn, "so I was thinking we could try playing one of your games together in your new room, what do ya think?"

"Sure, any requests?" You and Jane just seemed to have been getting along better and better recently.

"Just choose something that seems like we would both enjoy, I'm not really familiar with your stuff."

You agreed as you both proceeded to drown your pancakes in syrup and quickly finish them. You and Jane got dressed in something comfortable and met back in your room. You took the heart shaped key and opened the cupboard to look at your game collection to consider your options.

One that immediately sprang to mind was this new strategy JRPG you got off a friend's recommendation, the entire playable cast consisted of cute girls that you could create. Since Jane liked to dress up and role play like any little girl, her being able to make her own character to customize to be as girly as she wanted would be a great introduction to RPGs for her and you play along side.

Another good option was a classic character platformer, its main character was pretty cute looking and it reminded you of when you first started playing games as a kid. Maybe you could build a connection with her with this?

The last thing that came to mind was a colorful puzzle game, that had a lot of colorful and pretty effects whenever you cleared tiles.

You showed the game to Jane and her eyes lit up with glee at the sight. Feeling assured, you put the game into the console. At the main menu, you realized that the style seemed to evoke a fantasy magical girl-esque experience. When the two of you started, the game gave you options to customize the four main characters however you wanted. The customization options were very extensive, not only could you customize your character's class, clothes and appearance but also their personality type, age and their personal background and relationship's to each other. Since this was Jane's playthrough, you told her that she should have one attacker, one ranged fighter, one magician and a healer to start. In earnest, Jane started on the first character, the magician, which she named after herself. The minimum age she could set her character to was 13 and her main color was pink. The character looked cute with her long fancy pink dress with a fire design around it, Her background was a princess and her personality type was labeled 'cute'.

Then she began on the archer which she named after...you? Jane said she wanted to make you in the game, so she did just that. Your name was Lia, 16 years old, and your color was green. Jane tried to make her as girlish as possible, her hair was still brown but it was longer and girlish stylized in to ringlets. She had your slightly man-ish height but, had an hourglass figure. It was at this point you tried to convince Jane to you something a bit modest and not to flashy to wear. However, Jane was quick to prove, that wasn't really an option. So you got an equally fancy dress this one with a subdued flower design. When Jane set to princess as well a prompt came up notifying the two of you that all princesses are siblings as there is only one king in the starting region. This made Jane extra happy as that was what she was aiming for. Your personality type was labeled 'Big Sister', of course.

Jane spent less time on the knight and healer. The knight was a tanned skin woman in blue named Odette, she was 15 years old, her personality type was 'Confident', her dress was shorter and had a snow design and her background was 'Daughter of Blacksmith' and her relationship with your characters was 'childhood friends'. The Healer was a pale skinned and blonde haired girl named Lily, she was 13 years old as well, her personality type was 'timid', her her dress was very long with sparkle design and her background was 'Daughter of Traveling Merchant' and her relationship with your characters was left empty.

With everything set up, the game's story commenced.
